comment: These item bonus info texts are displayed in the FilterBlade Customizer tierList hoverBoxes. The texts are separate for section, baseType and (optional) unique name. The structure is: section (e.g. Uniques, Currency, ...) -> 'items' -> baseType (e.g. Simple Robe) -> property 1: 'text' (string to be displayed for the entire baseType), property 2: 'items' -> uniqueName (e.g. Tabula Rasa) -> 'text' (string to be displayed just for this one specific unique).

Geomancer's Incubator.text: Grants a random 6link weapon or armour
